mapper.select: SELECT CODE_ID, CODE, CODE_NAME FROM COMMONCODE WHERE CODE = 'SVC_CODE'

SELECT APT_CODE, APT_NAME, APT_ZIP, APT_ADD1, APT_ADD2, APT_CNT, APT_IMG, APT_DELETE, APT_HEAT, APT_TEL, APT_HEAD, TO_CHAR(APT_START, 'YYYY-MM-DD')APT_START, APT_END, APT_AREA FROM APART WHERE APT_CODE =#{aptCode}

SELECT SERVICE.SVC_ID , SERVICE.APT_CODE, COMMONCODE.CODE_NAME SVC_CODE, SVC_CODE AS RE_SVCCODE, SVC_NAME, SVC_ZIP, SVC_ADD1, SVC_ADD2, SVC_HEAD, SVC_TEL, SVC_HEAD_TEL, APART.APT_NAME APT_NAME, BANK.BANK_NAME SVC_BANK, SVC_BANK AS RE_SVCBANK, SVC_ACCT, TO_CHAR(SERVICECONTRACT.SVC_START, 'YYYY-MM-DD')SVC_START, TO_CHAR(SERVICECONTRACT.SVC_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD')SVC_END, SERVICECONTRACT.SVC_DEPOSIT, SVC_DEL FROM SERVICE LEFT JOIN SERVICECONTRACT ON SERVICE.SVC_ID = SERVICECONTRACT.SVC_ID LEFT JOIN BANK ON SERVICE.SVC_BANK = BANK.BANK_CODE LEFT JOIN APART ON SERVICE.APT_CODE= APART.APT_CODE LEFT JOIN COMMONCODE ON SERVICE.SVC_CODE = COMMONCODE.CODE_ID WHERE SERVICE.SVC_ID =#{svcId} ORDER BY SVC_ID DESC

SELECT A.*, ROWNUM SVCFILERUM FROM ( SELECT SVC_FILE_NO, SVC_ID, SVC_FILENAME, SVC_FILE, SVC_DATE, SVC_MIME, SVC_FILESIZE, SVC_FANCY FROM SERVICEFILE WHERE SVC_ID =#{svcId}
) A
mapper.insert:
SELECT #{aptCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'S'||LPAD(COUNT(*)+1,'3','0') FROM SERVICE
INSERT ALL INTO SERVICE ( SVC_ID, APT_CODE, SVC_CODE, SVC_NAME, SVC_ZIP, SVC_ADD1, SVC_ADD2, SVC_TEL, SVC_HEAD, SVC_HEAD_TEL, SVC_BANK, SVC_ACCT ) VALUES( #{svcId}, #{aptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{svcCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{svcName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{svcZip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{svcAdd1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{svcAdd2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{svcTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{svcHead,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{svcHeadTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{svcBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{svcAcct,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) INTO SERVICECONTRACT( SVC_ID, SVC_START, SVC_END, SVC_DEPOSIT, APT_CODE ) VALUES( #{svcId}, #{svcStart,jdbcType=DATE}, #{svcEnd,jdbcType=DATE}, #{svcDeposit,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{aptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) SELECT * FROM DUAL
mapper.update: UPDATE SERVICE SET SVC_CODE = #{svcCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SVC_NAME =#{svcName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SVC_ZIP =#{svcZip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SVC_ADD1 =#{svcAdd1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SVC_ADD2 =#{svcAdd2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SVC_TEL =#{svcTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SVC_HEAD =#{svcHead,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SVC_HEAD_TEL =#{svcHeadTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SVC_BANK =#{svcBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SVC_ACCT =#{svcAcct,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE SVC_ID = #{svcId}
